name: Cute! ASMR
description:
⠀
⠀INGENIOUS New Clicker - "CUTE! ASMR""CUTE! ASMR" is an exciting animated game that includes lots of pictures of girls to collect! This game is amazing with incredible graphics and great 3D sound!
"CUTE! ASMR" is a clicking game with lots of beautiful girls in different poses with realistic 3D sound. There are a lot of hentai pictures in the game and you have to click them all. So, let's tell you more about this amazing game!
There are two modes - "NORMAL" and "FREE".
In "NORMAL" mode: you can see hot new pictures and girly animations.
In "FREE" mode: you can complete endless levels with every girl.
What you can find in the game:
Beautiful pictures and animations of the girls.
Incredible ASMR sound on all levels.
Girls show reactions every time you click on them.
2 modes: "Normal" and "Free".
A gallery of hot pictures of girls that will be available in "Normal" mode.
In "Free" mode you can complete endless levels with any girl.
The name of the product in the store has no visual effect, it's just a few improvements for clicks.
Great graphic design, great 3D sound, hot girls, easy to play!
What more do you need for great gameplay?
If you love hot animated girls and flawless ASMR sound, then "CUTE! ASMR" is for you, now hurry up, start your adventure by discovering new scenes and enjoy this beautiful game!
